mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T03_GEN_MEMBER ( GEN_ID , PER_ID , FAR_ID , MOT_ID , ONWER_ID , CREATE_DATE , CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{genID} , #{perID} , #{farID} , #{motID} , #{onwerID} , #{createDate} , #{createTime} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE T03_GEN_MEMBER SET GEN_ID = #{genID} , PER_ID = #{perID} , FAR_ID = #{farID} , MOT_ID = #{motID} , ONWER_ID = #{onwerID} , CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} , CREATE_TIME = #{createTime} WHERE ID = #{iD}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "iD" , GEN_ID AS "genID" , PER_ID AS "perID" , FAR_ID AS "farID" , MOT_ID AS "motID" , ONWER_ID AS "onwerID" , CREATE_DATE AS "createDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "createTime" FROM T03_GEN_MEMBER WHERE ID = #{iD}

SELECT ID AS "iD" , GEN_ID AS "genID" , PER_ID AS "perID" , FAR_ID AS "farID" , MOT_ID AS "motID" , ONWER_ID AS "onwerID" , CREATE_DATE AS "createDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "createTime" FROM T03_GEN_MEMBER WHERE ID = #{iD} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "iD" , GEN_ID AS "genID" , PER_ID AS "perID" , FAR_ID AS "farID" , MOT_ID AS "motID" , ONWER_ID AS "onwerID" , CREATE_DATE AS "createDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "createTime" FROM T03_GEN_MEMBER WHERE ${_dynamicWhereCondition} ORDER BY ID ORDER BY ${_orderByCondition} FETCH FIRST ${_fetchFirstCondition} ROWS ONLY LIMIT ${_limitCondition} OFFSET ${_offsetCondition}
